person.persName: John Semonis, Jr. (Mercer County, Kentucky, farm hand)

body.p: Mercer County, Kentucky, farm hand. Kentucky native. Son of John Semonis, Sr., and Nancy Semonis. Married to Amanda Thomas Hudson Semonis in Mercer County, Kentucky, on May 16, 1858. Father of John Semonis, Jefferson Davis Semonis, and Armesia S. Semonis. Resident of Mercer County, Kentucky, in 1850. Farm hand in Mercer County in 1860.
